text: Chrysogonum perrieri is a species of plants in the sunflower family. It is found only in Madagascar.Humbert, Jean-Henri 1963. Flore de Madagascar et des Comores 189(3): 633 in FrenchHumbert, Jean-Henri 1923. Mémoires de la Société Linnéenne de Normandie 25: 114, 203, 301 ==References== perrieri Category:Flora of Madagascar Category:Plants described in 1923
title: Chrysogonum perrieri
